Yurui performs a full body horizontal spin with [[Kumogakure Swords|his swords]], attacking in quick succession.

== Trivia ==
* While unnamed in other media, this technique was named in ''[[Naruto Mobile]]''.
* Similar to many [[Kumogakure]] jutsu, this jutsu has an English name with kanji given to match its pronunciation.

[[fr:Taijutsu de Kumo - Anneau du Loup]]
[[pl:Kumogakure Taijutsu: Ōkami Ringu]]
